td.content: s:patient reports severe fatigue, Respiratory. td.content: s:patient presents with severe fever for 8 days. patient also reports severe fatigue. patient is a M aged 44 years. o:Height 185 cm, Weight 54.4 kg, Temperature 36.9 C, Pulse 73, SystolicBP 115, DiastolicBP 75, Respiration 17, mild rhonchi, HEENT: WNL, wheeze-BIL a:Tuberculosis p:performed E/M Level 3 (established patient) - Completed, and prescribed Ethambutol - 400 mg oral, Isoniazid - 100 mg tab, Pyrazinamide - 15 mg/kg oral, Rifampin - 10 mg/kg oral, and ordered segmentectomy - right segment of lung.
